first_para: Robert Malcolm Brian West, BSc, Dip Th, or self-styled, Reverend Robert West (born 11 October 1955), is the founder of the Christian Council of Britain and a British National Party activist.

full.extract: Robert Malcolm Brian West, BSc, Dip Th, or self-styled, Reverend Robert West (born 11 October 1955), is the founder of the Christian Council of Britain and a British National Party activist.
full.title: Robert West (politician)
